properties.description: Data From SAP summarized by date/material/company/channel

activities.name: Read_PO_DATA
activities.description: Read new PO data files from SAP

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Actual goods issue date} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Sales Document Category} as string,
		{0MATERIAL} as string,
		MaterialText as string,
		{Distribution Channel} as string,
		{0DIVISION} as string,
		{Sales Organization} as string,
		{Company code} as string,
		{Sales Office} as string,
		{Calendar day} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Base Unit of Measure} as string,
		{Billing Quantity in Base Unit} as decimal(10,0) '0000,0000'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['PO_2021_*.csv']) ~> CloudDataStore
CloudDataStore derive({Actual goods issue date} = toDate(byName('Actual goods issue date'), 'yyyy/MM/dd'),
		{Sales Document Category} = {Sales Document Category},
		{0MATERIAL} = {0MATERIAL},
		MaterialText = MaterialText,
		{Distribution Channel} = {Distribution Channel},
		{0DIVISION} = {0DIVISION},
		{Sales Organization} = {Sales Organization},
		{Company code} = {Company code},
		{Sales Office} = {Sales Office},
		{Calendar day} = toDate(byName('Calendar day'), 'yyyy/MM/dd'),
		{Base Unit of Measure} = {Base Unit of Measure},
		{Billing Quantity in Base Unit} = toDecimal(byName('Billing Quantity in Base Unit'))) ~> Mapping
Mapping sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		MANDT as string,
		KEYF0 as string,
		ERDAT as date,
		MATNR as string,
		VTWEG as string,
		BUKRS as string,
		FKIMG as decimal(8,4),
		VRKME as string,
		UMVKZ as decimal(8,4),
		MEINS as string,
		ARKTX as string,
		PRODH as string,
		MATKL as string,
		SPART as string,
		WERKS as string,
		EAN11 as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'yyyy/MM/dd',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		goods_date = {Actual goods issue date},
		doc_cat = {Sales Document Category},
		material = {0MATERIAL},
		dc = {Distribution Channel},
		dv = {0DIVISION},
		sales_org = {Sales Organization},
		company_code = {Company code},
		sales_office = {Sales Office},
		cal_day = {Calendar day},
		uom = {Base Unit of Measure},
		qty = {Billing Quantity in Base Unit},
		mat_text = MaterialText
	)) ~> AzureSQLServer
Mapping sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0066,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		agid = {Actual goods issue date},
		DocCategory = {Sales Document Category},
		{0MATERIAL},
		MaterialText,
		DC = {Distribution Channel},
		{0DIVISION},
		SalesOrg = {Sales Organization},
		Company = {Company code},
		SalesOffice = {Sales Office},
		CalDay = {Calendar day},
		UOM = {Base Unit of Measure},
		QTY = {Billing Quantity in Base Unit}
	)) ~> toParquet

source(output(
		{MANDT;MATNR;SPRAS;MAKTX;MAKTG} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0666,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		MATNR as string,
		SPRAS as string,
		MAKTX as string,
		LIFNR as string,
		NAME1 as string,
		NAME2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MMCSVDATA
MMCSVDATA derive(MATNR = MATNR) ~> csvmapping
csvmapping sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		MATNR as string,
		SPRAS as string,
		MAKTX as string,
		LIFNR as string,
		NAME1 as string,
		NAME2 as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MATNR,
		SPRAS,
		MAKTX,
		LIFNR,
		NAME1,
		NAME2
	)) ~> mmtomssql

source(output(
		MANDT as short,
		KEYF0 as string,
		ERDAT as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		MATNR as string,
		VTWEG as string,
		BUKRS as string,
		FKIMG as string,
		VRKME as string,
		UMVKZ as string,
		MEINS as string,
		ARKTX as string,
		PRODH as string,
		MATKL as integer,
		SPART as string,
		WERKS as string,
		EAN11 as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['PO_2021_*.csv']) ~> srcSapPoData
srcSapPoData derive(FKIMG = replace(toString(byName('FKIMG')),',', '.')) ~> Mapping
Mapping sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		KEYF0,
		ERDAT,
		MATNR,
		VTWEG,
		BUKRS,
		FKIMG,
		VRKME,
		UMVKZ,
		MEINS,
		ARKTX,
		PRODH,
		MATKL,
		SPART,
		WERKS,
		EAN11
	)) ~> ToParquetFile
Mapping sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		MANDT as string,
		KEYF0 as string,
		ERDAT as date,
		MATNR as string,
		VTWEG as string,
		BUKRS as string,
		FKIMG as decimal(8,4),
		VRKME as string,
		UMVKZ as decimal(8,4),
		MEINS as string,
		ARKTX as string,
		PRODH as string,
		MATKL as string,
		SPART as string,
		WERKS as string,
		EAN11 as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		KEYF0,
		ERDAT,
		FKIMG,
		VTWEG,
		BUKRS,
		FKIMG,
		VRKME,
		UMVKZ,
		MEINS,
		ARKTX,
		PRODH,
		MATKL,
		SPART,
		WERKS,
		EAN11,
		MATNR
	)) ~> toSQLdb

content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE HeinoLake
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://heinocloudstorage.blob.core.windows.net')

CREATE VIEW SalesTransactions

AS SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://heinocloudstorage.blob.core.windows.net/curated/',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/curated/part-00000-70429374-9890-4bdd-86df-953a3314c48b-c000.snappy.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'HeinoLake',
            FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MEINS = 'KG'

properties.description: Pull PO data to a serverless SQL pool

content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://heinocloudstorage.blob.core.windows.net/curated/part-00000-e6776e7b-4143-4b53-ad01-2dfe6111d24d-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime) AS current_year,
    COUNT(*) AS rides_per_year
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/yellow/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [nyc]
WHERE nyc.filepath(1) >= '2009' AND nyc.filepath(1) <= '2019'
GROUP BY YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime)
ORDER BY 1 ASC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
 TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
BULK 'https://heinocloudstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/PO_2021_02.csv',
FORMAT = 'CSV',
parser_version = '2.0',
        firstrow = 1
) with (
        gi_dte date,
        Division varchar(4)
    ) as rows

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://heinocloudstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/PO_2021_02.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 10000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://heinocloudstorage.blob.core.windows.net/curated/',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

select top 10 *
from openrowset(
        bulk 'latest/ecdc_cases.csv',
        data_source = 'covid',
        format = 'csv',
        parser_version ='2.0',
        firstrow = 2
    ) as rows

create external data source covid
with ( location = 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases' );

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://heinocloudstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/sapdata1001/2020_kna1.csv',
    format = 'csv',
    parser_version = '2.0',
    firstrow = 2 ) as rows

select top 10 *
from openrowset(
        bulk 'latest/ecdc_cases.csv',
        data_source = 'covid',
        format = 'csv',
        parser_version ='2.0',
        firstrow = 2
    ) with (
        date_rep date 1,
        cases int 5,
        year varchar(4) 4,
        geo_id varchar(6) 8
    ) as rows

source:
df = spark.sql("""
   SELECT 0MATERIAL, MaterialText, agid,
       SUM(QTY) as SumQTY
   FROM sapdata1.sales01
   WHERE QTY > 0 
   GROUP BY agid, 0MATERIAL, MaterialText
   ORDER BY 0MATERIAL
""") 

df.write.saveAsTable("sapdata1.aggregated")

display(df)

%%pyspark
df = spark.read.load('abfss://curated@heinocloudstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/part-00000-e6776e7b-4143-4b53-ad01-2dfe6111d24d-c000.snappy.parquet', format='parquet')
display(df.limit(100))

df.printSchema()

spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS SapData1")
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("SapData1.sales01")
